sources.note: Main website. Describes 30+ year history, cloud-based EHR and PM suite for offices/clinics/billing services of all sizes. Lists key product areas: EHR, PM, e-prescribing, patient portal, scheduling, lab interfaces.

EHR product page and mandatory disclosures. Shows ONC certification (15.04.04.2705.Crit.04.00.1.191111), Criterions EHR 4.0 Complete EHR Ambulatory. Lists features: customizable charting, e-prescribing, scheduling, patient portal, practice management. Mentions NewCrop and EMRDirect integrations.

Cures Act disclosures page. Three downloadable documents: 2022 CURES Disclosure, Mandatory Disclosure 2022, Patient EHI Data Export Overview. Displays SureScripts, ONC Health IT Certified, and Claredi 5010 certification seals.

Practice management product page. Describes cloud-based billing/PM system: scheduling, insurance verification, superbill generation, automated payment posting, A/R management, document management with annotations and digital signatures, recall procedures, audit tracking, reporting (daily transactions, multi-practice, PQRS).

Patient portal page. Details patient intake features: demographics, insurance, medical/social/family history, medications, allergies, pharmacy preferences, consent forms, questionnaires. Also covers secure messaging with routing, online payments, appointment scheduling, document/ID upload.

Lab interfaces page. Describes electronic lab ordering, automatic result receipt and filing, LOINC-coded results with MIPS measure calculation. States growing list of connected labs, imaging groups, and public health organizations but doesn't name specific partners.

Blog/feature article. Describes EHR integration, scheduling, billing/claims/insurance verification, patient portal, reporting/analytics, workflow automation (refills, referrals), security features (encryption, RBAC, audit logs), cloud deployment.

Capterra listing (403 blocked on fetch but search results revealed info). Small number of positive reviews praising vendor responsiveness and customization. Confirms product is called 'The Criterions Medical Suite'.
Software Finder listing. Describes HIPAA-compliant, mobile-accessible, specialty-customizable EHR. Built-in patient portal for records, refills, appointments, bill payment.
GetApp listing (403 blocked on fetch). Search results confirmed the product listing exists with reviews and feature details.
TrustRadius listing. Has 2025 reviews and ratings from verified users. Not fetched in detail.
MedicalRecords.com listing. Confirms product is 'Criterions Medical Suite (TCMS)' - integrated EHR + PM solution. Page content was mostly JS/CSS, limited useful text extracted.
ZoomInfo company profile (not fetched). Search results indicate 7-12 employees, headquartered in Garden City/Great Neck, NY area.
Criterions EHR login portal hosted at nymed.com domain. Suggests NY-area medical practice customers.
